content: > this pretty stocking stitch cardigan designed by martin storey and knitted using rowan selects patina has a delicate twisted rib edging at the hem and the cuffs which adds a subtle detail to the beautiful simplicity of this pattern perfect for either the day or the evening this transitional piece will work well in any wardrobe you will need 7 buttons rowan used # g422830 in copper from groves and banks in the uk finished measurements bust circumference 35 5 39 75 43 25 47 75 51 25 90 101 11 121 130 cm finished length 20 5 21 25 22 22 75 23 5 52 54 56 58 60 cm sleeve to underarm 17 75 17 75 18 18 18 45 45 46 46 46 cm yarn used rowan selects patina 4 5 5 5 6 balls shown in shade 415 lustre
